name: Another Citi customer
text: It seems that they don't want you to use apostrophes and double quotes. I tried sending them messages too and I experienced the same frustrating error message which would require you to login and enter OTP twice. I guess this may be related to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SQL_injection. The developers may have opted to disallow customers from using those characters, but yes, that is lame and there are other solutions to this.
